original_title: Have You Tried, Maybe, Not Worrying?
overview: Sageâ€™s world is riffled with an anxiety disorder that impedes all elements of her life. We follow her journey of isolation and raw existence. She's well practised at suppressing all signs of the illness but on a trip away with friends, her best friend becomes the catalyst for change.
title: Have You Tried, Maybe, Not Worrying?
